mapper.select: SELECT A.RESOURCE_ID,A.RESOURCE_NAME,A.RESOURCE_TYPE,A.RESOURCE_LEVEL,A.PARENT_RESOURCE_ID,A.PARENT_RESOURCE_ID,A.RESOURCE_ICON_CLASS,A.END_FLAG,A.ACTION_URL,A.DISPLAY_ORDER, CASE WHEN A.RESOURCE_LEVEL = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS OPENED FROM APP_RESOURCE A WHERE A.RESOURCE_TYPE != 'service' ORDER BY A.RESOURCE_LEVEL DESC ,A.DISPLAY_ORDER, A.PARENT_RESOURCE_ID , A.RESOURCE_ID

SELECT A.RESOURCE_ID ,A.RESOURCE_NAME,A.RESOURCE_TYPE,A.RESOURCE_LEVEL,A.PARENT_RESOURCE_ID,A.PARENT_RESOURCE_ID,A.RESOURCE_ICON_CLASS,A.END_FLAG,A.ACTION_URL,A.DISPLAY_ORDER, CASE WHEN A.RESOURCE_LEVEL = 1 THEN 1 WHEN A.RESOURCE_LEVEL = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS OPENED FROM APP_RESOURCE A WHERE A.RESOURCE_TYPE = 'service' ORDER BY A.RESOURCE_LEVEL DESC ,A.DISPLAY_ORDER , A.PARENT_RESOURCE_ID, A.RESOURCE_ID
SELECT MAX(A.RESOURCE_ID) AS RESOURCE_ID FROM APP_RESOURCE A WHERE A.RESOURCE_ID !='9999'
